Posts.Content: Oct 12, 2009 01:38PM PamSilverman wrote: Hi, I had the SIR-spheres inserted about 8 weeks ago and seemed to have recovered just fine and then all of a sudden this past Friday, Oct. 9 I had severe pain in the upper region of my liver and had to be taken to the ER because I couldn't breathe.  I'm at Duke Hospital and have been through a battery of tests and no one seems to be able to find out what caused this severe pain.  I'm better now and being released very soon, however, the pain is still there but not as bad.  I'm wondering did you have residual pain after the SIR-spheres?  Also, how long after did your doctor determine that they worked?  I haven't met with the vascular surgeon yet but have an apt. next week.  I'm just concerned about this pain that put me in the hospital.  I appreciate your response if you get a chance. Kind regards,
Posts.Title: SIR Spheres for Liver Mets SunshineLovesGod lifeline59
